text:
Inasmuch as research for objective 3 will be a pioneering venture, we can expect
to complete perhaps no more than two community case studies because of limitations
in time, staff and budget.
If we were to project a research program into the period beyond the present
grant, I would especially endorse many additional studies of program impact upon
communities.
Since plans for the international series programs are indefinite at this time,
nothing has been said about possible audience research dealing with them. If and
when this series is set up, appropriate research will be done, of course.
Merritt C. Ludwig
research Director
